posts._title: Anca Damian – La montagne magique AKA The Magic Mountain (2015)
posts.title: La montagne magique
posts.excerpt: The film investigates the adventures of mountain climber and photographer Adam J. Winkler, who fought in Afghanistan with the Mujahideen against the Soviets in the 1980s. The director employs a highly original artistic technique involving animated collage of period materials.

posts._title: Gerardo Vallejo – El camino hacia la muerte del Viejo Reales (1971)
posts.title: El camino hacia la muerte del Viejo Reales
posts.excerpt: Quote:La vida en los ingenios tucumanos a través del relato de un campesino tucumano y sus tres hijos. Quote:Aparecen en el filme Gerardo Ramón Reales y sus hijos Ángel, Mariano y Pibe, así como sus familias y amigos y vecinos de las localidades de Acheral, Santa Lucía, Caspichango y Famaillá. posts._title: Bahman Ark & Bahram Ark – Heyvan AKA Animal (2017)
posts.title: Heyvan
posts.excerpt: A man who wants to pass the border hunts a ram and decides to escape disguised as the animal.

posts.title: Rejected
posts.excerpt: A hilarious collection of animated television commercials that were rejected because of their creator’s failing grip on sanity.

posts._title: Ben Maddow & Sidney Meyers & Joseph Strick – The Savage Eye [+Extra] (1960)
posts.title: The Savage Eye
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:This drama takes the form of a story told using documentary material as an intrinsic part of the narrative. posts.director: Ben Maddow & Sidney Meyers & Joseph Strick

posts.title: Angel Baby
posts.excerpt: Two schizophrenics meet during therapy and fall passionately in love. Ahead of them lies the inevitable road to disaster – one they share to the end.

posts.title: Human Touch
posts.excerpt: The wealthy Edward (Haywood) sparks to Anna (Mckenzie), the lead voice in a choir that’s raising money for an upcoming trip to China. He donates money to her choir, and she agrees to sit for him for a series of still-life drawings. As Anna is drawn more into Edward’s life, their relationship — quite platonic …

posts._title: Sylvain Chomet – La Vieille dame et les pigeons AKA The Old Lady and the Pigeons (1998)
posts.title: La Vieille dame et les pigeons
posts.excerpt: In seductive central Paris, an undernourished gendarme willing to go to great lengths to feed himself hatches a desperate, yet utterly cunning plan.

posts.title: The Meaning of Life
